data.1: I CALL TO witness the heavens and the night Star --
data.2: How will you comprehend what the night star is?
data.3: It is the star that shines with a piercing brightness --
data.4: That over each soul there is a guardian.
data.5: Let man consider what he was made of:
data.6: He was created of spurting water
data.7: Issuing from (the pelvis) between the backbone and the ribs.
data.8: God has certainly power to bring him back (from the dead).
data.9: The day all secrets are examined
data.10: He will have no strength or helper.
data.11: So I call to witness the rain-producing sky,
data.12: And the earth which opens up (with verdure),
data.13: That this (Qur´an) is a decisive word
data.15: They are hatching up a plot,
data.16: But I too am devising a plan.
data.17: So bear with unbelievers with patience, and give them respite for a while.
